0x23F8F5FC7E8C4A6B0x4D3325F4// GetPedNearbyPeds
int GET_PED_NEARBY_PEDS(Ped ped, int* sizeAndPeds, int ignore);Console/PC structure definitions and example: pastebin.com/SsFej963For FiveM/Cfx.Re use-cases refer to: GET_GAME_POOL.

// GetPedNearbyPeds
